children.text: The 16mm reinforcement bar (N16) does not have sufficient lap in their joins.
The relevant Australian Standard, AS 2870 Residential Slabs and Footings states in section 5.3.2 Reinforcement that
‘Reinforcing bars shall have a lap length at splices not less than 700mm up to a bar diameter of 16mm’ .
The laps to these bars will need to be rectified prior to any concrete being poured.
